author: J.R.R. Tolkien
quote: In a hole in the ground there lived a hobbit.

quote: So comes snow after fire, and even dragons have their endings.

quote: There is nothing like looking, if you want to find something.

quote: Courage is found in unlikely places.

author: J.R.R. Tolkien
quote: The road goes ever on and on, down from the door where it began.
